import { useContext, useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { LangContext } from '../../context/langContext' import { intro } from './languages' import { Container, LeftWrapper, MainTitle, Hi, Links, Link, ProfilePic, Additional, RightPanel, PhotoContainer, HomeContainer } from "./homeStyles" import Ja from '../../img/ja-upraveny.jpg' import Gmail from '../../img/gmail.png' import Ig from '../../img/instagram.png' import Fb from '../../img/facebook.png' const Home = () => { const { lang } = useContext(LangContext) return ( { lang && intro[lang].hi } { lang && intro[lang].main }

{ lang && intro[lang].p1 }

 carryaway91@gmail.com carryshout Peter Babej ) } export default Home
